body_html:
The stack trace has a line outputs = parallel_apply(replicas, inputs, module_kwargs, used_device_ids). Apart from that, I am unsure how this came about.

If it's not parallel_apply then it could be DataLoader. Those are the two modules that are running threading.Thread on my system.
body_text:
The stack trace has a line outputs = parallel_apply(replicas, inputs, module_kwargs, used_device_ids). Apart from that, I am unsure how this came about.
If it's not parallel_apply then it could be DataLoader. Those are the two modules that are running threading.Thread on my system.
body:
The stack trace has a line ``outputs = parallel_apply(replicas, inputs, module_kwargs, used_device_ids)``. Apart from that, I am unsure how this came about. 

If it's not ``parallel_apply`` then it could be ``DataLoader``. Those are the two modules that are running ``threading.Thread`` on my system.
